TopicTitle: Kerbals only move in one direction (unfortunately it's not UP!) EVA Error

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm having an issue with EVA controls. I've check my key bindings, but no matter what command I try giving the EVA'd Kerbal, they always just go forward. I can jump and grab, but no strafing or backing up. I have a joystick bound to the axis control but I still have the default keyboard controls as well. The joystick seems to do nothing, and ASWD all make me go forward. Any thoughts?

Thanks!
Try pressing (or holding, I forget) the Alt key during Eva, it swaps between walking modes
You, sir, are a gentleman and a scholar. Worked like a charm! Thanks for the help. Joystick still doesn't work, but my kerbal is moving about and that's what matters. Thanks for the speedy help.
